alert.note: Alert for Canyon Ferry Area; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 11:03AM MST until February 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...The Interstate 90 Corridor between Bozeman and Whitehall, Canyon Ferry Area, Madison River Valley, and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Canyon Ferry Area; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
